text: Whenever we used to met...wo tera excitement se full name lekar bat ki shuruwat karna (which always made me feel energetic). Bhai! You are a cheerful and energetic person, I wish always remains the same.......
author: Aman  Gautam

text:
Mechy ke athay chapu bando me se ek ho tum....ğŸ™ğŸ™
Bhai hamari to mostly mech ki lab bhi sath me hoti thi....(jab tu hota tha group me, to lab me jyada phikra nahi karni padti thi)
Do you remember?... When we spent time once in canteen (behind CCD)....after that conversation I knew more about you..

Bhai bas aise hi life me aage bhi chapte rahna..
Best of Luck!
author: Aman  Gautam

text:
Hi! Apoorva
Maybe you have forgotten me....ğŸ˜… (yaad aa jau to mera bhi memoir likh dena..ğŸ˜›ğŸ˜€)
You are the first y17 girl jisse mai thoda sa comfortable tha bolne me (as I was shy in first year)  aur 
Humara first year me ek common course (ENG112C) jo tha.
 I remember an instance when I was sad due to getting low marks (I guess) in ENG112 and How you had relaxed me at that time with your soft skills..... (I guess No interaction after this course ğŸ˜… )

You are very chill and always be like that..
Best of Luck!!
author: Aman  Gautam

text:
Bhai, tera memoir likhna kaise bhul sakta hu.....

Mera Sasbe accha bhai ğŸ˜
First year ka cool and sweet roomate... (Sanjay se to meri vaise kam hi banti thi ğŸ˜…) Kabhi koi bhi bat bigad jati thi, kitne aasani se samjha deta tha hum dono ko apni soft and slow voice se (Mr. Softy ğŸ˜‚ )

Ye sentences jane kitni bar bola hoga....."Ye Aman, innocent ( bechara) to bilkul bhi nahi hai"  (that's rightğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚)
Teri vajah se mai kabhi me room me sad nahi baitha haoga... (missing your company, Bro)

Phir kabhi mauka milega to jaroor milenge....

Best of Luck!!
author: Aman  Gautam

text:
Maturity on the top level!!  ......Aise frend bahut kam mile IITK me :( 
Dedication and motivation towards academics, Nobody like you......CE ka DASSA Boi jo bola jata hai..LOL
who is that....??

Hi Ashutosh!!
Hum sayd first time Second-year me mile the (galat ho to maaf kar dena!!) and tab se hamari dosti ka safar suru hota hai...
Galaxy ke robotricks event se lekar Antragni'19 me mostly time tere sath hi chill kiya tha (I even remembered the phrase... Bhai, etna mai kisi antragni me kabhi nahi ghuma :) 

Now I will have to thank to IITK, that I got a GEM like you who always support me even in my tough time
I promise, will never foreget you, buddy!!  .... TU BHI MUJHE MAT BHUL JANA
author: Aman  Gautam

text:
Hann Bro, you are the only one, jiske parents ko bhi  mai IITK me admission lene se pahle janta tha  Pahli mulakat sayd hamari counseling karate samay kisi Lecture hall me hui thi

Tu mere hi jaise tha first year me - Simple , Sincere and focused, Sayd tabhi teri company mujhe acchi lagti thi 
Antragni, Skating me kafi enjoy kiya tha apan ne sath me ğŸ˜€
Jabse Robocon join kiya tha tab to mulakat hoti hi rahti thi....Single room ko divide jo kar liye the..LOL

Finally Wishing you Best Of Luck for your future!!
author: Aman  Gautam

text:
Me: Oye! Kya kar rha hai....Abe tu room par hi pada rahta hai
Koi sports vagarah start kar de..thoda energetic feel karega
(That's how I  used to start my conversation with Mr. DJ ( maaf kar dena bhai, yhi accha ğŸ˜lag rha hai)

Mohit: (in leisure , asking an overasked Ques without giving reply ) Tune friends poora dekh liya kya? (Me: Nahi ğŸ˜…) .....after being disappointed (thinking inside....ab next time nahi pucchuga)
...bHai bas esi tarah se hi tumko sad kiya hoga for a moment ( sorry for that)

tera wo enthusiastic voice  tone me "bHai..bHai" bolna (I really liked it....but copy kabhi nahi kar paya tumhari tarah lol)

Wo sath me badminton match khelna and rarely match jitna tere se...

Ek tera hi room tha apni wing me,  jahan mai jyada time spend karta tha....aise kafi sari aur bhi memories hai...so ending in brief

Bhai accha smile karte ho...aise hi smile karte rho life me
Best of Luck!
author: Aman  Gautam

text:
Mechy course ke jab bhi marks aate the.....to maximum marks pane valo me mostly  tumhara name hi sunta tha (mulakat to bad me hui hogi sayd but Name pahle hi yadd ho gya tha ğŸ˜„ )

Sabhi logo ne jo dedicated , sincere and hard-working bola hai wo ğŸ’¯ sahi hai....
Eske alawa  you are also humourous and kind-hearted..

Bhai, Best of Luck for your future Endeavours!
author: Aman  Gautam

text:

author: Aman  Gautam

text:
